header.h4: Welcome to GoNexus! Let's get started!

body.p: In this guide, you will be learning how to use GoNexus with some demos provided in this guide.

footer.small: If you already know how to use GoNexus, click here to skip this guide.

header.h4: Selecting A Theme For Your Character

body.p: In order to make a character in GoNexus, you need to select a theme in order to get started.

footer.small: Already made a character? Click here to go to the theme selection for the lvm.

body.p: After you select a theme, the CC from 2016 will load the theme you selected. Below, you can use it to create your first character.

footer.small: Already made a character? Click here to go to the theme selection for the lvm.

body.p: You character has been saved successfully! Click on the Next button to continue to the next step.

header.h4: Selecting A Theme For Your Video

body.p: In order to make a video in GoNexus, you need to select a theme in order to get started.

footer.small: If you have already made a video in GoNexus, you may click here to move on to the Video Management step.
footer.h6: Want to make characters? click here to go to the theme selection for the cc.

body.p: After you select a theme, the LVM from 2016 will load the theme you selected. below you can use it to create your first video.

footer.small: If you have already made a video in GoNexus, you may click here to move on to the Video Management step.
footer.h6: Want to make characters? click here to go to the theme selection for the cc.

body.p: After you make your video, the LVP from 2016 will load the video you made. below you may view your video and make any changes you need to make before moving on with the next step.

At some point you may need to manage your videos in GoNexus. Don't know how? this step provides everything you need to know about Video Management. below are your videos and their actions. Try using one of the actions to see what happens.

Sometimes, you may want to see what the Video Maker for GoAnimate looked like a few years after GoAnimate was made. Thankfully we brought along a feature to help with just that. Below, you may select what lvm year you want and a filename you want displayed after it. There are some pretty cool hidden features you can enable on the LVM as well using the Other Options section below.
body.h6: Secondly, select what features you want enabled on the LVM while you are making a video.

body.p: You have selected what year and filename you wanted for the LVM and enabled some options as well.
body.small: Below, you should see the Studio load now. If not, flash may not be enabled.

body.p: You are done making a video with (or without) the custom LVM. now you will be able to see what the LVP looked like a few years after GoAnimate was made. By using the year you typed (or selected) into the custom lvm (or year input) field, your video will be shown to you using the LVP from the year you typed into the custom lvm field.
body.small: Below, you should see the Player load now. If not, flash may not be enabled.

h6.html: Please keep in mind that this feature is still in beta. Please send a bug report to us if you encounter any problems with the custom lvp.
